actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the Office of the Assistant Secretary of Health for public health service management (rescission numbered R87-42) proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Rescinds budget authority for the Office of the Assistant Secretary for Health for public health service management (R87-42).

titles.title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the Office of the Assistant Secretary of Health for public health service management (rescission numbered R87-42) proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
